snippet: Former President Michelle Bachelet was unable to elect enough lawmakers from her coalition to pass sweeping political proposals, but she still may be able to push through many of her social and economic policies if she is elected.
lead_paragraph: Former President Michelle Bachelet was unable to elect enough lawmakers from her coalition to pass sweeping political proposals, but she still may be able to push through many of her social and economic policies if she is elected.

headline.main: Chile: Former President’s Coalition Kept in Check
headline.print_headline: Chile: Former President’s Coalition Kept in Check
